I dug a pitfall trap in front of the Pokémon Center
to help catch interlopers!
ch0085_09_hopef/2701_0701_02_10:

top so no one would know there was a hole there!
ch0085_09_hopef/2701_0701_03_10:
It’s the perfect camouflage! It looks just like the
ground around it now, so no one will ever know!
ch0085_09_hopef/2701_0701_04_10:
I mean, I couldn’t even tell it was there when I
stood on top of it!
